tool.name: Display at UCSC
tool.description: displays selected datasets in the UCSC genome browser
tool.help:
**Info**
This tool displays the selected datasets with their custom track attributes (if any) in the UCSC genome browser.
You can set the track attributes (name, color, visibility and group) for a dataset by clicking on **"edit attributes"** button (pencil icon) next to the dataset name in the history panel.
